greysome's page

Welcome to my little space!

I am Way Yan, an undergraduate student at the National University of Singapore. I really like computers — in particular, peering into their inner workings, studying the history of CS, and just building my silly little programs. I've also set a personal goal of working through the exercises in The Art of Computer Programming (my written-up solutions can be found here).

Beyond academics, I have a deep affinity for chiptune music. It is a surprisingly flexible and expressive medium, and one can bring up intriguing technical matters like the emulation of sound chips.

Feel free to disturb me at win at u dot nus dot edu dot sg, and also check out some of my smart and cool friends: Sanjay, Boon Suan, and Timothy.
